summary: A big aggressive Nord follower that takes pleasure in the fight.
descriptionHtml:
Alerik usually looks pretty grumpy, but has a heart of gold and will fight to the bitter end for his allies. His health is at 450 and stamina at 350, he is set as essential not invulnerable. He comes with Ebony Armor with the main file but I also posted a \"Fine Clothes\" version for those not running a follower customization mod. He also comes with a basic daedric sword and daedric bow. He is an option for marriage as well.

There are a few must have mods for this, just for the look to be correct
 you should have the following mods...

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488 BetterMales Beautiful Nudes and Faces, use the Younger Faces Merged with Men by Geonox.
 For the body use the same BetterMales mod FavoredSoulMeshes body of your choosing.

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13076 Cute Eyes 115X Makes the iris in the eye bigger to escape the tiny eye look.

*************The armor in the screenshots is Vagabond Armor found in Immersive Armor mod by Hothtrooper44, HIGHLY RECOMMENDED*******************************************************************
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19733] Immersive Armor by Hothtrooper44[/url]
[URL=http://imgur.com/GSbV9][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GSbV9.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

Installation: NMM recommended.

Manual, put the Alerik.ESP file in your skyrim/data file. The textures and meshes files drop into the Skyrim/Data file in
textures and meshes. Hopefully you know the drill:) Open the Nexus Mod Manager to make sure the plugin is active and if you
 are running UFO make sure Alerik plugin is after UFO in the load order.


Uninstallation: NMM delete Alerik Follower Mod.
Manual, Delete Alerik.esp file from Skyrim/Data file. Delete Alerik.esp
 in Data/textures/actors/character/FaceGenData/FaceTint file. Delete Alerik.esp from your
 Skyrim/Data/Meshes/Actors/Character/FaceGenData/FaceGeom file. Win.


Alerik can be found in the Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood:)
Hope you enjoy him:)

Sharpshooter\'s Extreme Graphics Vision ENB used in all screenshots.
author: SerecenHwke
